Name: Gaze Of Temenos
Effect Text:
Test Endurance (8+). Fail: Gain +3 @Danger, +3 @Fate and the [Dread|AL0299] Condition card. Then remove this card from the deck and draw another BP card.
The will beyond wills looks into your heart and finds only fear.

Name: Absorbed
Effect Text:
When you are Absorbed, place your Titan here. As long as you are Absorbed, you cannot move (voluntarily or involuntarily) and you attack as if you were on a VP.
*Indigestion*: If there are any Absorbed Titans, when the Chimera suffers a Secondary Stack Wound, place 1 generic token under each Titan miniature here. Then, if there are 2 or more generic tokens under a miniature, that Titan is regurgitated! Place their miniature on an empty space adjacent to the Chimera.
<End of Titan Round> Each Absorbed Titan gains 1 Ambrosia token and draws an Obol. Discard all generic tokens under the Absorbed Titans.
[Zeus] Godform has +1 @Power when Absorbed.
If you are ever Absorbed while being Absorbed, you die.
<End of Battle> Each still Absorbed Titan resolves the _Bellynaut_ Special Event

Name: Infuriating Roar
Effect Text: Each Titan gains +2 @Danger and +1 @Rage. Lose -1 @Refugees. @WoO Cyclonus moves to center of the Board

Name: Infuriating Roar
Effect Text: Each Titan gains +3 @Danger and +2 @Rage. WoO Cyclonus moves to center of the Board

Name: Terrorize
Effect Text: All Titans on Vantage Points suffer Displacement onto a Rear space and Knockdown. Lose -1 Humanity
